tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Exactly how bad is a CCS2? How long were the wells disconnected for? What were the fumes we were all breathing in while they were disconnected? We need answers, people are scared. #stopthestink #capitoff

@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @DaveJonesNuL @DefraGovUK @DefraUKAir Will somebody tell us what the hell is going on? We have the right to breath clean fresh air, why hasn't this been sorted? #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/W0rz3OA7GL

Tom and new recruit Kate have been out with a team to check #flood defences at St. Aidan‚Äôs washlands to ensure they're in good condition to reduce #flood risk to #Castleford. 

These washlands can store 7 million cubic metres of water, equivalent to 2,800 Olympic swimming pools. https://t.co/XtyFUUDGVz

tweets.text:
Well that's a wrap on launch day! Thanks to the 400+ people who joined us this evening, and to the amazing @YHClimateCom team, our fab speakers, and the fantastic @Geri_E_L_Scott who guided us through tonight!

Exciting times for #YorkshireClimate

https://t.co/Z780LKRKaZ

üö® @EnvAgencyMids say a ‚Äòsignificant breach‚Äô has taken place at Walleys Quarry landfillüëá and that it was ‚Äònot acceptable‚Äô. It‚Äôs time the EA ordered it to be close down and capped off. Enough is enough. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Gu9Ziz12vU

@annjsmall @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Yup, I get asked by lots of people if I recommend @KeeleUniversity as a uni destination, usually a resounding yes , but for the last year it's been a strong no because of the landfill.

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Omg exactly how bad is this we need details, I don't want to live in Newcastle under Lyme anymore, students should know the risks before they choose to study at Keele University, EA have been informed by residents for years, no excuse for any breach, this is on you @EnvAgencyMids

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Have Public Health England been informed? You must notify them of incidents with a CCS Category 1 or 2 impact where there is likely to be public concern about the health effects! The updated doctors notes, the reports to PHE the Health concerns grow #stopthestink @StinkStopthe

Excited to be part of the 400 individuals & organisations joining the official launch of @YHClimateCom tonight
Presentations from @EnvAgency @YorkshireWater and @PCANcities Chair among others highlighting need for unified approach in our region to tackle #ClimateCrisis

The Wye is dying from pollution. Great Citizen science here.  Fund the @EnvAgency Enforce the laws. Help us and write to your MP, copy to secretary.state@defra.gov.uk George Eustace and  @Jesse_Norman https://t.co/ApJzm7aGwt

As part of our ongoing regulation of the @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry landfill site in #Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme we have carried out an audit and issued the company with a Compliance Assessment Report.

Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn https://t.co/gyKH2icf6z

@YHClimateCom @DollyParton @EnvAgency @DanJarvisMP @emmabridge_1 @LBIAirport @andy_gouldson Great point just been made, we spend too much time competing and not enough time collaborating. There is a need to reverse this thinking and tip the balance of power to where it is needed. #yorkshireclimate

tweets.text: Went on a #litter pickup myself down Hyde Lane to #FrogmoreLakes.. Absolutely awful how people treat our #RiverVer, lakes and countryside. Perhaps #litter bins could be provided, more volunteer pickers, better signs up asking people to stop this? . @VerValleySoc @ClubVerulam https://t.co/xZjpCE7pcD

urls.title: Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission gets to work | Yorkshire & Humberside Climate Commission
urls.description: An independent advisory group, set up to support ambitious climate action in Yorkshire and the Humber, has launched today, 17 March. The Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission brings together a team of climate leaders from across the public, private and third sectors, in the largest regional Commission of its kind in the UK.

tweets.text:
Today is the launch of the Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission.
Emma Howard Boyd, Chair of @EnvAgency, said: ‚ÄúThe @YHClimateCom‚Äôs approach recognises the importance of both reducing emissions and helping people prepare for climate shocks."
https://t.co/cmcYytzSv5

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 For a CCS Category 2 will the operator now be prosecuted? @ClareDinnisEA isn‚Äôt CCS Cat 2 associated with a significant impact on human health,quality of life or the environment?Is it time for @PHE_uk to act? It‚Äôs not just the stink now #outofcontrol #stopthestink  @StinkStopthe

More stunning work! Graham Brownhill writes:

Another 15 bags from in and around the Fairywell Brook today. Mainly from Andrew Morris Snr. Knutsford Martin came along to give a helping hand.

March total 826
Annual 3,850

@MccFionaW @MCCWythenshawe @Biffa @EnvAgency @MikeKaneMP https://t.co/vmLm0rTnbQ

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 A little slap on the wrist then?

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Capitoff, last night was unbearable feels like I'm eating stink bombs, please procure an evacuation site so that residents being poisoned on any night can go to somewhere safe they can breathe clean air  & sleep safely #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 Oooh slap on the wrist ! Grow a pair.  Take responsibility and take meaningful action.

A really positive event üåäüëè #NewPerspectives #PowerOfYouth. ‚¨áÔ∏è The local brook & otter highway I mentioned, brown from torrential rain, its estuary mouth & site of an exciting flood plain restoration project @ClintonDevon @EnvAgency @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/JmPLwOBHOq https://t.co/JDxhyrvil7

We‚Äôre very grateful for the support of the Yorkshire and Humber Leaders Board and the 22 councils across Yorkshire and the Humber. ü§ù

Our other key partners include @EnvAgency, @YorkshireWater, @NorthPowergrid, @NGNgas, @The_TUC, @YorkshireUnis and @UniversityLeeds. https://t.co/t427T4XmKN

urls.title: Introducing the Environment Agency and their role in Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Learn about who is in the PPP project from the Environment Agency and what they hope to achieve through the project

tweets.text: Over the next few months we will be sharing introduction videos from our 18 partners. Kicking off with @EnvAgency  telling us about their many initiatives for the PPP project, from Cornwall to East Anglia: https://t.co/HpwOHxoDSy

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 lack of care highlighted yet again & just silence.Thousands in misery,health issues grow, public services & businesses suffer.Newcastle under Lyme & now parts of Stoke are just ‚Äòno go‚Äô stinking zones disgraceful & morally wrong,who will step up? #StopTheStink
